db:abstract.db:para: Displays the legend of a chart.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A legend is a graphical object that displays the legend of a chart. The legend state is updated by the ChartView type when series change. The Legend type properties can be attached to the ChartView type. For example:

db:note.db:para: There is no QML API available for modifying legend markers. Markers can be modified by creating a custom legend, as illustrated by Qml Custom Example.

db:section.db:title: alignment : alignment
db:section.db:para: Defines how the legend is aligned with the chart. Can be Qt.AlignLeft, Qt.AlignRight, Qt.AlignBottom, or Qt.AlignTop. If you set more than one flag, the result is undefined.

db:section.db:title: backgroundVisible : bool
db:section.db:para: Whether the legend background is visible.

db:section.db:title: borderColor : color
db:section.db:para: The line color of the legend.

db:section.db:title: color : color
db:section.db:para: The background (brush) color of the legend.

db:section.db:title: font : Font
db:section.db:para: The font of the markers used by the legend.

db:section.db:title: labelColor : color
db:section.db:para: The color of the brush used to draw labels.

db:section.db:title: reverseMarkers : bool
db:section.db:para: Whether reverse order is used for the markers in the legend. This property is false by default.

db:section.db:title: showToolTips : bool
db:section.db:para: Whether tooltips are shown when the text is truncated. This property is false by default. This property currently has no effect as there is no support for tooltips in QML.

db:section.db:title: visible : bool
db:section.db:para: By default, this property is true.
